answers.answer: How many weeks are you? I think it depends on weeks not weight
I got induced because baby was maturing 8lb and I was a ftm so doc didn't want him any bigger but I was 39wks and he ended up weighing 7lb11oz

I'm 38 wks my doctor wants to do the ultrasound to see how big she is and told me we'd talk about induction after my u/s if she's on the big side because I'm a diabetic. I just want to know what's too big? Has anyone been induced because of this?

Yeah I've heard they usually measure bigger than they really end up weighing I just wanted to know what's considered big enough to want to induce. I really don't want to be induced I'd prefer her to come on her own. Stupid diabetes

question: I have an ultrasound Wednesday to get babies weight because im a diabetic does anyone know how big my little has to be for them to induce?
title: inducing according to weight
